data.prayer: Lord, please provide elders whose hearts are completely yours in every town in the state of Hawaii.
data.verse: The reason I left you in Crete was that you might put in order what was left unfinished and appoint elders in every town, as I directed you.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Hawaii, United States
data.section_summary: What people or resources could you pray for in this photo?

data.prayer: Lord, you already know the names of the prophets you want to raise up in Hawaii. Please, raise them up and give them the courage to speak your truth to your church.
data.verse: Before I formed you in the womb I knew you, and before you were born I consecrated you; I appointed you a prophet to the nations.

data.label_1: One disciple of Jesus for every 3 lost neighbors

data.prayer: Spirit, build the strength and maturity of the local leaders in Hawaii, United States. Show them that faithfulness is more important than knowledge. Show them that the Spirit, the Word, and prayer is enough in order to grow and lead.
Father, as people seek answers on the internet, please help them find the gospel in Hawaii, United States.
data.verse: So I say to you, ask, and it will be given to you; seek, and you will find; knock, and it will be opened to you.

data.prayer: Lord we ask you on behalf of the Okinawan, Ryukyuan people. 0.2% are known to be believers. Oh God, please share with them the great gift of your son Jesus and your kingdom.
Father, thank you that you will never abandon the church of Hawaii, United States.
data.verse: Be free from the love of money, content with such things as you have, for he has said, “I will in no way leave you, neither will I in any way forsake you.

data.prayer: Spirit, help the 373,833 believers find a person of peace today among the 1,041,867 lost neighbors around them. And help them start discovery bible studies in these unbelieving homes.
data.verse: Suddenly a man in shining clothes stood before me and said, ‘Cornelius, God has heard your prayer and remembered your gifts to the poor. Send to Joppa for Simon who is called Peter. He is a guest in the home of Simon the tanner, who lives by the sea.’ So I sent for you immediately, and it was good of you to come. Now we are all here in the presence of God to listen to everything the Lord has commanded you to tell us.”

data.prayer: Father, may the churches in Hawaii, United States honor local leaders who work hard for the flock of God.
data.verse: Pay careful attention to yourselves and to all the flock, in which the Holy Spirit has made you overseers, to care for the church of God, which he obtained with his own blood.

location.name: Hawaii
location.cities_list: Honolulu, East Honolulu, Pearl City, Hilo, Kailua
